feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 07 at 3:07PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Heavy Snow Into Tuesday Morning... A strong front is moving through area, producing moderate to heavy snow along with reduced visibilities to one half mile or less at times. Look for the snow to begin to taper off tonight and into Tuesday morning with an additional 3 to 5 inches of snow.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued November 07 at 3:07PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water In Kotzebue Sound... A strong low pressure system moving north across the Chukchi Sea will push a surge of water through Kotzebue Sound Tuesday night through Wednesday morning. Flooding is not expected, but with sea ice in place in Kotzebue Sound, there`s a possibly that ice may be pushed on shore along the Baldwin Peninsula, including Kotzebue.
